summary: Didier never knew that a wrong film review of a film which he did not bother to watch would land him in numerous troubles.
cast: Fabrice Luchini|Sandrine Kiberlain|Valentina Cervi|Michel Piccoli|Bernadette Lafont|Laurent Lucas|Denis Podalydès|Nathalie Boutefeu|Micheline Boudet|Edouard Baer|Violetta Sanchez|Wilfred Benaïche|Marilú Marini|Alexis Nitzer|Dimitri Rataud|Patricia Dinev|Pascal Bonitzer
title: Rien sur Robert
